channel.title: Smf for free help!
channel.description: how can i install the runescape theme on my smf forum. please help me

item.title: Smf for free help!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:367481”][quote author=pasta186 link=topic=463644.msg3391632#msg3391632 date=1288994013]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=463644.msg3391629#msg3391629 date=1288993847]

The only way to solve a smfforfree problem is to get your own hosting and install smf on it

Well,actually,Thats not entirely true,
There are many ways to solve smfforfree problems,The community help forum for example i dont have my own hosting,i just have the smfforfree forum
[/quote]I was saying how smfforfree is shit etc and no matter how much you put into it, it will always be.

Actually,i think it is rather good. Im not going to say your wrong,i just dont think your right. I dont want to spend money on a forum and i find smfforfree to be quite reliable.
[/quote]I owned a smfforfree, and I can tell you that it is very bad. You probably just haven’t owned any other type. And also, you can register free hosting, and if it has fantastico, it takes about 5 minutes to install a real SMF version.[/quote]
Hm,i may give it a go,thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf for free help!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:7, topic:367481”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=463644.msg3391629#msg3391629 date=1288993847]

The only way to solve a smfforfree problem is to get your own hosting and install smf on it

Well,actually,Thats not entirely true,
There are many ways to solve smfforfree problems,The community help forum for example i dont have my own hosting,i just have the smfforfree forum
[/quote]I was saying how smfforfree is shit etc and no matter how much you put into it, it will always be.

Actually,i think it is rather good. Im not going to say your wrong,i just dont think your right. I dont want to spend money on a forum and i find smfforfree to be quite reliable.[/quote]I owned a smfforfree, and I can tell you that it is very bad. You probably just haven’t owned any other type. And also, you can register free hosting, and if it has fantastico, it takes about 5 minutes to install a real SMF version.

Read full topic

item.description:

Dastan has a point,but i use smfforfree
I suggest going to smfforfree.com then having a look at the forum there
There are loaddds of tutorials,im pretty sure you will be able 2 find one
Good luck
